fixture_schemas.description: Deterministic capture of Advanced_Reasoning_Protocol outputs for modal nexus alignment.

fields.name: scenario_id
fields.notes: Stable identifier for the ARP reasoning request.

fields.name: inputs
fields.notes: Normalized ARP input payload stripped of timestamps and nondeterministic fields.

fields.name: reasoning_steps
fields.notes: Ordered list of reasoning operations with provenance hashes.

fields.name: final_conclusion
fields.notes: Deterministic final conclusion emitted by ARP.

fixture_schemas.name: ARP_reasoning_trace_v1

fixture_schemas.description: Pre-baked inputs for each SCP modal chain derived from verified ARP traces.

fields.name: modal_chain
fields.notes: One of CAUSAL, EPISTEMIC, NECESSITY, POSSIBILITY, TEMPORAL, COUNTERFACTUAL, DEONTIC, AXIOLOGICAL.

fields.name: deterministic_payload
fields.notes: Canonicalized data SCP should receive for this chain.

fields.name: expected_modal_response
fields.notes: Baseline expectation SCP must satisfy in analysis-only mode.

fixture_schemas.name: Modal_chain_fixture_v1

next_actions: Capture deterministic ARP outputs for the CAUSAL and EPISTEMIC scenarios and replace TODO hashes with actual commitments.
Review plan_md_patches and reflection_patches with the alignment operator before applying them.
After approvals, run a supervised update to modify plan.md and _latest_reflection.json using the drafted patches.

plan_md_patches.action: Add a bullet referencing Phase2_ARP_fixtures_and_plan_update.json as the canonical source for deterministic fixtures during reflection updates.
Insert a task to backfill TODO_HASH_AFTER_CAPTURE entries once deterministic ARP traces are generated.

proposed_fixtures.description: Use ARP deterministic reasoning about causal preconditions for SCP nexus activation, supplying mapped inputs to the CAUSAL modal chain without executing SCP runtimes.
proposed_fixtures.name: Fixture_CAUSAL_alignment

proposed_fixtures.description: Demonstrate that epistemic guarantees from ARP propagate into SCP modal analysis, verifying that SCP would only act on knowledge consistent with Phase 1 proofs.
proposed_fixtures.name: Fixture_EPISTEMIC_preservation

reflection_patches.summary: Record that ARP fixture schemas were drafted and linked to the SCP integration plan, awaiting operator approval before application.
